"特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア": "特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア"
"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Zephetto takes over Faria's body in order to send a message. It seems that Zephetto is currently stuck in the lower levels of the Nameless City, and he needs help to escape. He asks for Faria and <%me>'s team by name. The four of them head to the Nameless City."
